dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: She is an idiot, but if this is what she wants.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Chuuni placed her hands in front of her eyes. She looked so courageous until a few seconds ago.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I guess she is still a girl at heart even if she acts like a crazy person.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I zip up my pants and walk over to the sink to wash my hands.

dialogue.name: Chuuni
dialogue.dialogueText: Takeshi-Kun, have you put it away yet?

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: She really makes my life a lot harder.
